fomod.Name: SeverActions - SkyrimNet Action Pack
fomod.Author: Sever
fomod.Description: A comprehensive action, prompt, and behavior pack for SkyrimNet. 44 actions, 16 context prompts, and a native C++ SKSE plugin. NPCs can follow, travel, craft, cook, brew, read books aloud, manage outfits, handle gold, use furniture, fight, get arrested and escorted to jail, and more â€” all driven naturally through conversation. Includes optional adult content modules.
